com.inrix.sdk

Class InrixCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.InrixCore

  • public final class InrixCore
extends Object
    INRIX Android SDK entry point.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  InrixCore.AuthenticationListener
      Interface for receiving notifications when the user is authenticated or when the user needs to sign in.
      static interface  InrixCore.OnInrixReadyListener
      Interface for receiving notifications when the INRIX SDK is ready to make requests.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(@NonNull
              Context context)
        Initializes all required processes and loads the default configuration.
        Caller must hold following permissions prior to calling #initialize(Context):
        • Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
        • Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context, which contains global information about the application environment.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - Thrown if caller does not have following permissions:
        • Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
        • Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(@NonNull
              Context context,
              @NonNull
              Configuration configuration)
        Initializes all required processes and loads the specified configuration.
        Caller must hold following permissions prior to calling InrixCore.initialize(Context):
        • Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
        • Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context, which contains global information about the application environment.
        configuration - SDK configuration.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - Thrown if caller does not have following permissions:
        • Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
        • Manifest.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Reset the existing Inrix instance, clearing all user-related data.

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Shut down the InrixCore's activity tracking and terminates all future scheduled tasks in the Sdk.

      • getInstance

        public static InrixCore getInstance()
        Gets the singleton InrixCore instance.
        Returns:
        InrixCore instance

      • startActivityRecognition

        public static void startActivityRecognition(Context context)
        Starts activity recognition tracking. ActivityRecognition helps you to save some battery power by enabling and disabling current location tracking based on your current activity. In other words, if the device does not move, the SDK can turn off GPS or other location tracking to save battery power.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context, which contains global information about the application environment.
        See Also:
        InrixCore.stopActivityRecognition()

      • stopActivityRecognition

        public static void stopActivityRecognition()
        Stops activity recognition tracking.
        See Also:
        InrixCore.startActivityRecognition(android.content.Context)

      • endTrackingSession

        public static void endTrackingSession()
        Ends the tracking session.

        The method will end tracking in 30 seconds, unless tracking is resumed with InrixCore.resumeTrackingSession(android.content.Context).

      • resumeTrackingSession

        public static void resumeTrackingSession(Context context)
        Resumes the tracking session.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context, which contains global information about the application environment.
        See Also:
        InrixCore.endTrackingSession()

      • getConfiguration

        public static Configuration getConfiguration()
        Gets the configuration information.
        Returns:
        The configuration information.

      • isReady

        public static boolean isReady()
        Returns whether the SDK is ready to make requests.
        Returns:
        true if the SDK is ready; otherwise, false.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Returns whether the SDK is Initialized Refer InrixCore.initialize(Context).
        Returns:
        true if the SDK is Initialized; otherwise, false.

      • addAuthenticationListener

        public static boolean addAuthenticationListener(InrixCore.AuthenticationListener listener)
        Adds an InrixCore.AuthenticationListener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener.
        Returns:
        true if the listener was successfully added; otherwise, false.
        See Also:
        InrixCore.removeAuthenticationListener(com.inrix.sdk.InrixCore.AuthenticationListener)

      • removeAuthenticationListener

        public static boolean removeAuthenticationListener(InrixCore.AuthenticationListener listener)
        Removes the specified listener in order to stop receiving authentication events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the listener was removed; otherwise, false.
        See Also:
        InrixCore.addAuthenticationListener(AuthenticationListener)

      • addOnInrixReadyListener

        public static boolean addOnInrixReadyListener(InrixCore.OnInrixReadyListener listener)
        Adds a listener that will receive a notification when the SDK is ready to make requests.

        Note that requests are not guaranteed to be completed until after the InrixCore.OnInrixReadyListener.onInrixReady() callback is received.

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener.
        Returns:
        true if the listener was successfully added; otherwise false.
        See Also:
        InrixCore.removeOnInrixReadyListener(com.inrix.sdk.InrixCore.OnInrixReadyListener), InrixCore.OnInrixReadyListener

      • removeOnInrixReadyListener

        public static boolean removeOnInrixReadyListener(InrixCore.OnInrixReadyListener listener)
        Removes the specified listener in order to stop receiving notifications.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the listener was removed; otherwise, false.
        See Also:
        InrixCore.addOnInrixReadyListener(com.inrix.sdk.InrixCore.OnInrixReadyListener)

      • invokeService

        public static ICancellable invokeService(@NonNull
                         String actionName,
                         @Nullable
                         Map<String,Object> arguments,
                         @Nullable
                         GeoPoint region,
                         @NonNull
                         IDataResponseListener<String> listener)
        Invoke arbitrary server API, given the API name and additional parameters required by the API.
        Parameters:
        actionName - Target API name.
        arguments - Additional API parameters. Parameter value can be a String, Boolean, Number, Date, GeoPoint.
        region - The region parameter for the api call.
        listener - Response listener instance.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable to cancel the request.
        Throws:
        InrixException - thrown when SDK is not initialized.
        InrixException - thrown when actionName is null.
        InrixException - thrown when listener is null.
